description:
PromptSmart is a revolutionary app that transforms your iPhone or iPad into the first iOS teleprompter with patent pending speech recognition scrolling.  It's the ultimate companion for any speech or presentation - PromptSmart gives you professional tools at your fingertips. 

+Recommended for iPhone 5/iPad 3 and newer, English speakers only (see Specifications below)
 
**Now with text mirroring option for use with teleprompter glass**

Select accolades from v1.0:
+ "For once, an app that uses voice recognition works just as well as it promises to" - 148Apps (4.5/5 stars)
+ “I was amazed at how well it worked with the voice recognition technology “ - MacSources (5/5 stars)
+ "PromptSmart is a smart, almost magical app…The developers of PromptSmart put a lot of thought into making the app highly customisable" - Makeuseof.com

With patent pending VoiceTrack(tm) speech recognition technology, PromptSmart will follow your every word during your speech, automatically scrolling the text at your natural pace in real time.  For less structured presentations, stay on-point with the built-in digital notecards to make sure you address important topics seamlessly.  Whatever your needs, PromptSmart takes the stress out of public speaking with this reliable and intuitive mobile app for any occasion. 
 
PromptSmart is ideal for class lectures, keynote addresses, mobile video production, video bloggers, business presentations, toastmasters events, wedding toasts, and any situation where you are delivering prepared comments.
 
**Watch a video demonstration of VoiceTrack on our YouTube channel:  youtube.com/promptsmart
 
Features include:
+ VoiceTrack proprietary speech recognition: PromptSmart  follows your voice, adjusting scroll speed according to your actual pace and position in the text (no data/ internet connection required)
+ Text mirror option for use with teleprompter glass rigs
+ PromptSmart needs no special calibration and is designed with a simple, intuitive interface
+ Place-holding (with VoiceTrack): If you go off-script, PromptSmart will hold your place until you get back on the text
+ Change fonts, text sizes and colors, and pick the guide and indicator styles that works best for you
+ Download .docx or .txt files from various cloud services
+ Edit docs in the app and export via email or text message
+ Audio recording: Practice your speech and play it back to make improvements
+ Additional features: Pre-set scrolling (constant words per minute) and manual scroll options, full rich text for notecards, timer, auto-capitalize for scripts, and option to remember position upon closing of app
 
(Please note: VoiceTrack is only available for scripts)
 
Specifications:
+ Languages supported: English only
+ Recommended devices for VoiceTrack: iPhone 5 and iPad 3 and newer (VoiceTrack may not function optimally on older devices)
+ File extensions supported for import: .docx and .txt
+ Cloud services supported (requires data connection): Box, Dropbox, Gmail, Google Drive, and OneDrive
+ Recommended script word count: up to 5,000
+ Recommended speech length (with continuous VoiceTrack use): up to 30 minutes
+ Recommended number of digital notecards: up to 200
+ Built-in or external microphone required for VoiceTrack (Note: not compatible with Bluetooth mics)
 
Please visit http://promptsmart.com/about/how-it-works/ for optimal guidelines for using VoiceTrack.

We want you to have a great experience using PromptSmart.  If you have any issues at all, please contact us at team@promptsmart.com and we will do our utmost to help.
 
Who made PromptSmart?
 
PromptSmart was born out of a passion for public speaking. As a Communications Fellow at Wharton Business School, the founder of PromptSmart coached and mentored students in the art of public speaking. He saw an opportunity to leverage today's mobile technology to make public speaking easier and less stressful for all.
